roleset.name: attach living tissue onto other living tissue, again

role.descr: tissue brought in to be attached

example.name: regraft-v
example.text: They then regrafted the two squares, but each in the other's place: the belly skin was grafted on the back, and the back skin on the belly.

example.name: regrafting-n
example.text: * SPR -LRB- subtree pruning and regrafting -RRB- , TBR -LRB- tree bisection and reconnection -RRB- , Swofford and Olsen

roleset.note: REGRAFT-V, REGRAFT-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
